app.title: New Friend
app.description: Meet new people from around the world and make new connections in a safe environment.

providers.sendMessageError: ChatProvider - sendMessage: message type is invalid or chat is not active
providers.sendInterlocutorDataError: ChatProvider - sendInterlocutorData: message type is invalid or chat is not active
providers.acceptTradeOfferError: ChatProvider - acceptTradeOffer: chat is not active

register.title: Registration

username.max: Username can be at most 20 characters

register.successMessage: Account created! Check your email for confirmation.
register.success: Account created! Check your email for confirmation.

confirm.description: Complete your account registration by clicking the link in the email or entering the confirmation code.
confirm.alternativeMethod: You can confirm your account either by clicking the link in the email or entering the code above in the app.
confirm.noEmail:
Didn't receive the email?
Check your spam folder or contact the administrator.

notification.title: Account successfully confirmed! You have been logged in.
notification.description: Thank you for confirming your account. You have been automatically logged in.

confirm.title: Account confirmation
confirm.instructions: You can confirm your account both by clicking the link in the email and by entering the code above in the app.
confirm.checkSpam: Check your spam folder or contact the administrator.
confirm.success: Account successfully confirmed! You have been logged in.
confirm.successDescription: Thank you for confirming your account. You have been automatically logged in.

channelCreator.title: New Channel Creator
channelCreator.description: Create a new channel to form a space that brings together people with similar interests.

thematic.title: Thematic
thematic.fullDescription: Create a channel where users are randomly matched for 1-on-1 conversations.

group.title: Group
group.fullDescription: Create a channel where all users chat together in a group chat.

channelName.label: Channel Name
channelName.description: Enter the display name for the channel

channelTags.label: Channel Tags
channelTags.description: Enter 2 to 5 keywords related to the channel's topic

maxUsers.label: Maximum number of users
maxUsers.description: Enter the maximum number of users who can join the channel or leave empty if you want no limit

adultOnly.label: Adults only
adultOnly.description: If the channel should be marked as +18, check this option

moderation.label: Moderation
moderation.description: Check if the channel should be moderated by user voting

showNicknames.label: Show nicknames
showNicknames.description: Check if usernames should be visible

onlyLoggedIn.label: Logged in users only
onlyLoggedIn.description: Check if only logged in users can send messages

messageTimeout.label: Time interval between messages
messageTimeout.description: Time interval between messages (in seconds) if you want to limit spam. Empty field means no restrictions.

blockedSignUp.title: Sign In
blockedSignUp.description: To create a new channel, you must be signed in. Sign in to access this feature.

examples.minecraft: Looking for people for Minecraft server
examples.croatia: Anyone for a trip to Croatia

maxUsers.number: Enter a number or leave empty

timeout.number: Enter a number or leave empty

errors.nameTaken: Channel name is taken or invalid.
errors.createFailed: Failed to create channel. Please try again.

success.title: Channel Created!
success.nextStep: You can now go to your channel.
success.canNavigate: You can now navigate to your channel.

initial.title: Find Your Perfect Match
initial.description: Connect with people from around the world who share your interests and values. Start your conversation today!

searching.title: Searching for People...
searching.description: We're looking for someone who shares your interests. This may take a moment.

messages.interlocutorLeft: Your conversation partner has left the chat.

trade.requestSent: You sent a contact exchange request
trade.loginRequired: Peer can accept offer only when logged in
trade.ignoreNote: If you don't want to exchange information, ignore the peer's offer

channels.title: Browse Channels
channels.description: Join thematic channels to meet people with similar interests or create group conversations for deeper connections.

empty.title: No Active Channels
empty.description: Currently, there are no active channels. Be the first to create one!

channels.channelsDescription: Choose a thematic channel 1-on-1 to connect with someone who shares similar interests. Use regional channels if you want to chat with someone from your area. Join group channels to write together with more users in a relaxed atmosphere.
channels.filtersDescription: Filters allow you to set preferences for your conversation partner in 1-on-1 channels – from age and gender to interests and other characteristics. This helps you find people you can easily connect with. When matching conversation partners, your preferences will be prioritized.

command.title: Command Palette
command.description: Search for a command to run...
